title: Lowest Crop Production Index
description: In 2022, Malta's crop production index was recorded at 53.79, indicating a significant decline compared to the base period of 2014-2016. This suggests challenges in agricultural productivity.

title: Highest Energy Import Dependency
description: Malta's energy imports accounted for 389.55% of its energy use in 2022, highlighting the country's heavy reliance on external energy sources.

title: Minimal Methane Emissions from Energy
description: In 2015, Malta reported methane emissions from fugitive energy sources at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, showcasing its low contribution to greenhouse gas emissions in this sector.
